title: Track Awesome Influxdb Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Influxdb (mark-rushakoff/awesome-influxdb) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome projects, libraries, tools, etc. related to InfluxDB

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 12, 2021
items.content_text:
### Queries / Hooks

*   [Time Series Admin (⭐141)](https://github.com/timeseriesadmin/timeseriesadmin) - Administration panel and querying interface for InfluxDB databases
items.content_html:
Queries / Hooks

  • Time Series Admin (⭐141) - Administration panel and querying interface for InfluxDB databases

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 09, 2020
items.content_text:
### Unofficial

*   [InfluxDB-Client-for-Arduino (⭐402)](https://github.com/tobiasschuerg/InfluxDB-Client-for-Arduino) - Arduino client for InfluxDB
items.content_html:
Unofficial

  • InfluxDB-Client-for-Arduino (⭐402) - Arduino client for InfluxDB

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Jan 29, 2020
items.content_text:
### Projects / Dedicated

*   [node-opcua-logger (⭐183)](https://github.com/coussej/node-opcua-logger) - Collect industrial data from OPC UA Servers

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [logagent (⭐391)](https://github.com/sematext/logagent-js) - is a modern, open-source, light-weight log shipper. Logagent includes [influxdb input plugin](https://sematext.com/docs/logagent/input-plugin-influxdb-http/) and [influxdb output plugin](https://sematext.com/docs/logagent/output-plugin-influxdb/) and many other [integrations](https://sematext.com/docs/logagent/plugins/)

### Plugins / Hooks

*   [logagent influx input plugin](https://sematext.com/docs/logagent/input-plugin-influxdb-http/) - Logagent plugin to receive data via Influx Line Protocol
*   [logagent InfluxDB output plugin](https://sematext.com/docs/logagent/input-plugin-influxdb-http/) - Plugin to send data via Influx Line Protocol

### Miscellaneous / Hooks

*   [cleanflux (⭐32)](https://github.com/Transatel/cleanflux) - proxy around /query endpoint with auto retention policy selection and on the wire bug corrections
items.content_html:
Projects / Dedicated

  • node-opcua-logger (⭐183) - Collect industrial data from OPC UA Servers

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • logagent (⭐391) - is a modern, open-source, light-weight log shipper. Logagent includes influxdb input plugin and influxdb output plugin and many other integrations

Plugins / Hooks

  • logagent influx input plugin - Logagent plugin to receive data via Influx Line Protocol
  • logagent InfluxDB output plugin - Plugin to send data via Influx Line Protocol

Miscellaneous / Hooks

  • cleanflux (⭐32) - proxy around /query endpoint with auto retention policy selection and on the wire bug corrections

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 13, 2019
items.content_text:
### Import tools / Hooks

*   [JMeter2InfluxDB (⭐10)](https://github.com/soprasteria/jmeter2influxdb) - Read JMeter results in a csv file and put results in InfluxDB after the load test

### Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

*   [DBeaver](https://dbeaver.com/databases/influxdb/) - DBeaver Universal Database Tool, DBeaver Enterprise has special extensions for InfluxDB
*   [InfluxDB Studio (⭐912)](https://github.com/CymaticLabs/InfluxDBStudio) - InfluxDB Studio is a UI management tool, its inspiration comes from other similar SQL database management tools (use InfluxData.Net run on MS Windows)
items.content_html:
Import tools / Hooks

  • JMeter2InfluxDB (⭐10) - Read JMeter results in a csv file and put results in InfluxDB after the load test

Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

  • DBeaver - DBeaver Universal Database Tool, DBeaver Enterprise has special extensions for InfluxDB
  • InfluxDB Studio (⭐912) - InfluxDB Studio is a UI management tool, its inspiration comes from other similar SQL database management tools (use InfluxData.Net run on MS Windows)

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Apr 24, 2019
items.content_text:
### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [Sematext Agent (⭐13)](https://github.com/sematext/sematext-agent-integrations) - [Open source monitoring agent](https://sematext.com/blog/now-open-source-sematext-monitoring-agent/) to collect metrics from Solr, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, JVM, JMX, ClickHouse, MySQL, Hadoop, and more via pluggable integrations. Output via Influx Line Protocol to InfluxDB or [Sematext Cloud](https://sematext.com/cloud/)
items.content_html:
Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Sematext Agent (⭐13) - Open source monitoring agent to collect metrics from Solr, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, JVM, JMX, ClickHouse, MySQL, Hadoop, and more via pluggable integrations. Output via Influx Line Protocol to InfluxDB or Sematext Cloud

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Mar 28, 2019
items.content_text:
### Official

*   [Go (⭐191)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb1-client) - Go client for InfluxDB 1.x

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [traffic\_stats](https://traffic-control-cdn.readthedocs.io/en/latest/overview/traffic_stats.html) - Acquires and stores statistics about CDNs controlled by [Apache Traffic Control](https://trafficcontrol.apache.org/)

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [heapster (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/kubernetes-retired/heapster) - Monitor container resource usage of a [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) cluster

### Plugins / Hooks

*   [snap-plugin-publisher-influxdb (⭐8)](https://github.com/intelsdi-x/snap-plugin-publisher-influxdb) - Publishes [snap (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/intelsdi-x/snap) metrics to InfluxDB

### Import tools / Hooks

*   [LoadRunner Raw Results Exporter](https://admhelp.microfocus.com/lr/en/12.60-12.62/help/WebHelp/Content/Controller/raw_results_exporter.htm) - To export scenario results (load test results) to InfluxDB
*   [nmon2influxdb (⭐80)](https://github.com/adejoux/nmon2influxdb) - Import [nmon](http://nmon.sourceforge.net/pmwiki.php) file into InfluxDB
items.content_html:
Official

  • Go (⭐191) - Go client for InfluxDB 1.x

Projects / Dedicated

  • traffic_stats - Acquires and stores statistics about CDNs controlled by Apache Traffic Control

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • heapster (⭐2.6k) - Monitor container resource usage of a Kubernetes cluster

Plugins / Hooks

  • snap-plugin-publisher-influxdb (⭐8) - Publishes snap (⭐1.8k) metrics to InfluxDB

Import tools / Hooks

  • LoadRunner Raw Results Exporter - To export scenario results (load test results) to InfluxDB
  • nmon2influxdb (⭐80) - Import nmon file into InfluxDB

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 23, 2018
items.content_text:
### Hosting of InfluxDB / SaaS / Hooks

*   [InfluxCloud](https://cloud.influxdata.com/plan-picker) - From the creators of InfluxDB
*   [Aiven](https://aiven.io/influxdb) - Provides a choice of host (AWS, Google, DigitalOcean, etc.), geographic location, and server specs
*   [Scalingo](https://scalingo.com/databases/influxdb) - Provides a choice of server specs
*   [HostedMetrics](https://hostedmetrics.com/product/influxdb/) - Geared towards custom application monitoring by hosting the combination of InfluxDB, Grafana, and StatsD
items.content_html:
Hosting of InfluxDB / SaaS / Hooks

  • InfluxCloud - From the creators of InfluxDB
  • Aiven - Provides a choice of host (AWS, Google, DigitalOcean, etc.), geographic location, and server specs
  • Scalingo - Provides a choice of server specs
  • HostedMetrics - Geared towards custom application monitoring by hosting the combination of InfluxDB, Grafana, and StatsD

items.content_html:

*   [sidekiq-influxdb (⭐18)](https://github.com/vassilevsky/sidekiq-influxdb) - A [Sidekiq](https://sidekiq.org/) middleware to send job execution metrics to InfluxDB

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Apr 20, 2018
items.content_text:
### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [Apache JMeter](https://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/realtime-results.html) - Popular load testing tool, you can get real-time results sent to a backend through the InfluxDBBackendListenerClient which allows you to send metrics (active threads, response time ...) to an InfluxDB Backend using UDP or HTTP protocols
items.content_html:
Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Apache JMeter - Popular load testing tool, you can get real-time results sent to a backend through the InfluxDBBackendListenerClient which allows you to send metrics (active threads, response time ...) to an InfluxDB Backend using UDP or HTTP protocols

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Apr 16, 2018
items.content_text:
### Projects / Dedicated

*   [pysysinfo\_influxdb](https://github.com/nagylzs/pysysinfo_influxdb) - Periodically send system information into influxdb (uses python3 + psutil, so it also works under Windows)
items.content_html:
Projects / Dedicated

  • pysysinfo_influxdb - Periodically send system information into influxdb (uses python3 + psutil, so it also works under Windows)

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Mar 26, 2018
items.content_text:
### Unofficial

*   [influxdb-cpp-rest (⭐45)](https://github.com/d-led/influxdb-cpp-rest) - A C++ InfluxDB client with a batching async interface

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [accelerometer2influx (⭐18)](https://github.com/CorpGlory/accelerometer2influx) - Android application that takes the x-y-z axis metrics from your phone accelerometer and sends the data to InfluxDB.
*   [proc\_to\_influxdb (⭐1)](https://github.com/d-led/proc_to_influxdb) - Console app to observe Windows process starts and stops via InfluxDB
items.content_html:
Unofficial

  • influxdb-cpp-rest (⭐45) - A C++ InfluxDB client with a batching async interface

Projects / Dedicated

  • accelerometer2influx (⭐18) - Android application that takes the x-y-z axis metrics from your phone accelerometer and sends the data to InfluxDB.
  • proc_to_influxdb (⭐1) - Console app to observe Windows process starts and stops via InfluxDB

*   InfluxDB in IoT world. [Part 1: Introduction](https://www.easyitblog.info/2017/11/10/influxdb-and-grafana-fighting-together-with-iot-data-attack/) | [Part 2: Hosting and scaling on AWS](https://www.easyitblog.info/2017/11/14/influxdb-in-iot-world-aws-part-2/) | [Part 3: Plotting graphs using Grafana](https://www.easyitblog.info/2017/11/26/influxdb-in-iot-world-making-it-production-ready-part-3/)
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Sep 11, 2017
items.content_text:
### Projects / Dedicated

*   [aggregateD (⭐14)](https://github.com/ccpgames/aggregateD) - A [dogstatsD](https://docs.datadoghq.com/guides/dogstatsd/) inspired metrics and event aggregation daemon for InfluxDB

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [Domoticz](https://www.domoticz.com) - Open source Home Automation System

### Libraries / Non-dedicated

*   [pyVsphereInflux (⭐3)](https://github.com/fennm/pyVsphereInflux) - A library and supporting script for pulling data from [vSphere](https://www.vmware.com/products/vsphere.html) and inserting it into InfluxDB

### Plugins / Hooks

*   [fluent-plugin-influxdb (⭐111)](https://github.com/fangli/fluent-plugin-influxdb) - A buffered output plugin for [fluentd](https://www.fluentd.org/) and InfluxDB

### Miscellaneous / Hooks

*   [influx-protector (⭐12)](https://github.com/ve-global/influx-protector) - proxy to prevent dangerous queries getting to influxdb
items.content_html:
Projects / Dedicated

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • pyVsphereInflux (⭐3) - A library and supporting script for pulling data from vSphere and inserting it into InfluxDB

Plugins / Hooks

  • fluent-plugin-influxdb (⭐111) - A buffered output plugin for fluentd and InfluxDB

Miscellaneous / Hooks

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Dec 03, 2016
items.content_text:
### Reference material

*   [Official documentation](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/latest/)

### Official

*   [C# (⭐200)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-csharp) - A .NET library for efficiently sending points to InfluxDB
*   [Rails (⭐0)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-rails) - Ruby on Rails bindings to automatically write metrics into InfluxDB

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [Influxdb-Powershell (⭐9)](https://github.com/vsavornin/Influxdb-Powershell) - Powershell script to send Windows Performance counters to an InfluxDB Server
*   [vsphere-influxdb-go (⭐215)](https://github.com/Oxalide/vsphere-influxdb-go) - Collect VMware vSphere, vCenter and ESXi performance metrics and send them to InfluxDB

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [logary (⭐527)](https://github.com/logary/logary) - High performance, multi-target logging, metric and health-check library for mono and .Net

### Libraries / Non-dedicated

*   [lua-resty-influx (⭐28)](https://github.com/p0pr0ck5/lua-resty-influx) - [OpenResty](https://openresty.org/en/) client for InfluxDB

### Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

*   [rossmcdonald/influxdb (⭐44)](https://github.com/rossmcdonald/influxdb) - Ansible role for installing, configuring, and maintaining InfluxDB
items.content_html:
Reference material

  • Official documentation

Official

  • C# (⭐200) - A .NET library for efficiently sending points to InfluxDB
  • Rails (⭐0) - Ruby on Rails bindings to automatically write metrics into InfluxDB

Projects / Dedicated

  • Influxdb-Powershell (⭐9) - Powershell script to send Windows Performance counters to an InfluxDB Server
  • vsphere-influxdb-go (⭐215) - Collect VMware vSphere, vCenter and ESXi performance metrics and send them to InfluxDB

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • logary (⭐527) - High performance, multi-target logging, metric and health-check library for mono and .Net

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • lua-resty-influx (⭐28) - OpenResty client for InfluxDB

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

  • rossmcdonald/influxdb (⭐44) - Ansible role for installing, configuring, and maintaining InfluxDB

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Jan 09, 2016
items.content_text:
### Official

*   [Java (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-java) - Java client for InfluxDB
*   [PHP (⭐429)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-php) - PHP client for InfluxDB
*   [Python (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-python) - Python client for InfluxDB
*   [Ruby (⭐368)](https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-ruby) - Ruby client for InfluxDB

### Unofficial

*   [influent (⭐38)](https://github.com/gobwas/influent) - InfluxDB Javascript driver

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [influxdb-sqlserver (⭐72)](https://github.com/zensqlmonitor/influxdb-sqlserver) - Collect Microsoft SQL Server metrics for reporting to InfluxDB and visualize them with Grafana
*   [Telegraf (⭐16k)](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf) - (Official) plugin-driven server agent for reporting metrics into InfluxDB

### Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

*   [FluxDash (⭐36)](https://github.com/vrecan/FluxDash) - Terminal based InfluxDB dashboard

### Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

*   [chef-influxdb (⭐53)](https://github.com/bdangit/chef-influxdb) - Chef cookbook for InfluxDB
*   [influxdb-formula (⭐9)](https://github.com/saltstack-formulas/influxdb-formula) - Installs and configures the InfluxDB timeseries database
items.content_html:
Official

  • Java (⭐1.2k) - Java client for InfluxDB
  • PHP (⭐429) - PHP client for InfluxDB
  • Python (⭐1.7k) - Python client for InfluxDB
  • Ruby (⭐368) - Ruby client for InfluxDB

Unofficial

  • influent (⭐38) - InfluxDB Javascript driver

Projects / Dedicated

  • influxdb-sqlserver (⭐72) - Collect Microsoft SQL Server metrics for reporting to InfluxDB and visualize them with Grafana
  • Telegraf (⭐16k) - (Official) plugin-driven server agent for reporting metrics into InfluxDB

Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 21, 2015
items.content_text:
### Unofficial

*   [node-influx-udp (⭐18)](https://github.com/mediocre/node-influx-udp) - Write to InfluxDB using its UDP interface

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [mesos-influxdb-collector (⭐16)](https://github.com/kpacha/mesos-influxdb-collector) - Lightweight [mesos](https://mesos.apache.org/) stats collector for InfluxDB
*   [mqforward (⭐78)](https://github.com/shirou/mqforward) - [MQTT](http://mqtt.org/) to influxdb forwarder

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [cloudwatch-sender (⭐53)](https://github.com/BBC-News/cloudwatch-sender) - Send metrics to InfluxDB/Graphite from [Amazon Cloudwatch](https://aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/)
*   [jmxtrans (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/jmxtrans/jmxtrans) - Effectively the missing connector between speaking to a JVM via JMX on one end and whatever logging / monitoring / graphing package that you can dream up on the other end.

### Libraries / Hooks

*   [go-metrics-influxdb (⭐69)](https://github.com/vrischmann/go-metrics-influxdb) - A reporter for the [go-metrics library (⭐3.5k)](https://github.com/rcrowley/go-metrics) which will post the metrics to InfluxDB
*   [logrus\_influxdb (⭐26)](https://github.com/Abramovic/logrus_influxdb) - InfluxDB Hook for [Logrus (⭐25k)](https://github.com/Sirupsen/logrus)

### Plugins / Hooks

*   [embulk-output-influxdb (⭐2)](https://github.com/joker1007/embulk-output-influxdb) - InfluxDB output plugin for [Embulk (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/embulk/embulk)
*   [exometer\_influxdb (⭐36)](https://github.com/travelping/exometer_influxdb) - [Exometer (⭐527)](https://github.com/Feuerlabs/exometer) reporter for InfluxDB
*   [influx-nagios-plugin (⭐29)](https://github.com/shaharke/influx-nagios-plugin) - [Nagios](https://www.nagios.org/) plugin for querying monitoring stats from InfluxDB
*   [kafka-influxdb (⭐217)](https://github.com/mre/kafka-influxdb) - A [Kafka](https://kafka.apache.org/) consumer for InfluxDB written in Python
*   [logstash-output-influxdb (⭐58)](https://github.com/logstash-plugins/logstash-output-influxdb) - Community-maintained [Logstash](https://www.elastic.co/products/logstash) plugin to output metrics to InfluxDB
*   [mod-influxdb (⭐13)](https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/mod-influxdb) - [Shinken](http://www.shinken-monitoring.org/) module for exporting data to InfluxDB
items.content_html:
Unofficial

  • node-influx-udp (⭐18) - Write to InfluxDB using its UDP interface

Projects / Dedicated

  • mesos-influxdb-collector (⭐16) - Lightweight mesos stats collector for InfluxDB
  • mqforward (⭐78) - MQTT to influxdb forwarder

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • cloudwatch-sender (⭐53) - Send metrics to InfluxDB/Graphite from Amazon Cloudwatch
  • jmxtrans (⭐1.7k) - Effectively the missing connector between speaking to a JVM via JMX on one end and whatever logging / monitoring / graphing package that you can dream up on the other end.

Libraries / Hooks

  • go-metrics-influxdb (⭐69) - A reporter for the go-metrics library (⭐3.5k) which will post the metrics to InfluxDB
  • logrus_influxdb (⭐26) - InfluxDB Hook for Logrus (⭐25k)

Plugins / Hooks

  • embulk-output-influxdb (⭐2) - InfluxDB output plugin for Embulk (⭐1.8k)
  • exometer_influxdb (⭐36) - Exometer (⭐527) reporter for InfluxDB
  • influx-nagios-plugin (⭐29) - Nagios plugin for querying monitoring stats from InfluxDB
  • kafka-influxdb (⭐217) - A Kafka consumer for InfluxDB written in Python
  • logstash-output-influxdb (⭐58) - Community-maintained Logstash plugin to output metrics to InfluxDB
  • mod-influxdb (⭐13) - Shinken module for exporting data to InfluxDB

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 19, 2015
items.content_text:
### Unofficial

*   [cl-influxdb (⭐24)](https://github.com/mmaul/cl-influxdb) - Common Lisp interface to the Time Series Database InfluxDB
*   [erflux (⭐29)](https://github.com/gossiperl/erflux) - InfluxDB client for Erlang
*   [influent.rs (⭐43)](https://github.com/gobwas/influent.rs) - InfluxDB Rust driver
*   [InfluxDB-Client-LabVIEW (⭐23)](https://github.com/johanvandenbroek/InfluxDB-Client-LabVIEW) - LabVIEW client for InfluxDB
*   [instream (⭐227)](https://github.com/mneudert/instream) - InfluxDB driver for Elixir
*   [scala-influxdb-client (⭐121)](https://github.com/paulgoldbaum/scala-influxdb-client) - Asynchronous InfluxDB client for Scala

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [ntp\_checker (⭐4)](https://github.com/fss1/ntp_checker) - compares internal NTP sources and warns if the offset between servers exceeds a definable (fraction of) seconds

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [internet\_data\_usage (⭐2)](https://github.com/precurse/internet_data_usage) - Python based application to pull data plan usage for different carriers such as Telus and Koodo

### Libraries / Non-dedicated

*   [crow-metrics](https://github.com/robey/crow-metrics) - small metrics collector for node servers

### Plugins / Hooks

*   [statsd-influxdb-backend (⭐171)](https://github.com/bernd/statsd-influxdb-backend) - A naive InfluxDB backend for StatsD

### Other tools / Hooks

*   [influx-alert (⭐35)](https://github.com/joshrendek/influx-alert) - A tool to query InfluxDB and send alerts based on a YAML config

### Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

*   [influxdb-release (⭐1)](https://github.com/pivotal-cf-experimental/influxdb-release) - Experimental BOSH release for InfluxDB

### Queries / Hooks

*   [influxer (⭐117)](https://github.com/palkan/influxer) - InfluxDB ActiveRecord-style

Unofficial

  • erflux (⭐29) - InfluxDB client for Erlang

  • InfluxDB-Client-LabVIEW (⭐23) - LabVIEW client for InfluxDB
  • instream (⭐227) - InfluxDB driver for Elixir
  • scala-influxdb-client (⭐121) - Asynchronous InfluxDB client for Scala

Projects / Dedicated

  • ntp_checker (⭐4) - compares internal NTP sources and warns if the offset between servers exceeds a definable (fraction of) seconds

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • internet_data_usage (⭐2) - Python based application to pull data plan usage for different carriers such as Telus and Koodo

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • crow-metrics - small metrics collector for node servers

Plugins / Hooks

  • statsd-influxdb-backend (⭐171) - A naive InfluxDB backend for StatsD

Other tools / Hooks

  • influx-alert (⭐35) - A tool to query InfluxDB and send alerts based on a YAML config

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 15, 2015
items.content_text:
### Projects / Dedicated

*   [Charmander (⭐67)](https://github.com/att-innovate/charmander) - Charmander is a lab environment for measuring and analyzing resource-scheduling algorithms
*   [sysinfo\_influxdb](https://github.com/novaquark/sysinfo_influxdb) - Collect and send system (linux) info to InfluxDB

### Libraries / Non-dedicated

*   [metrics (⭐319)](https://github.com/beberlei/metrics) - (PHP) Simple library that abstracts different metrics collectors. "I find this necessary to have a consistent and simple metrics (functional) API that doesn't cause vendor lock-in"
items.content_html:
Projects / Dedicated

  • Charmander (⭐67) - Charmander is a lab environment for measuring and analyzing resource-scheduling algorithms
  • sysinfo_influxdb - Collect and send system (linux) info to InfluxDB

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • metrics (⭐319) - (PHP) Simple library that abstracts different metrics collectors. "I find this necessary to have a consistent and simple metrics (functional) API that doesn't cause vendor lock-in"

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 09, 2015
items.content_text:
### Projects / Dedicated

*   [Influx-Capacitor (⭐45)](https://github.com/poxet/Influx-Capacitor) - Influx-Capacitor collects metrics from windows machines using Performance Counters. Data is sent to influxDB to be viewable by grafana

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [Glances (⭐29k)](https://github.com/nicolargo/glances) - Glances an Eye on your system
*   [metrics.sh (⭐143)](https://github.com/pstadler/metrics.sh) - Collect and forward metrics using portable shell scripts

items.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Jul 20, 2015
items.content_text:
### Unofficial

*   [capacitor (⭐63)](https://github.com/olauzon/capacitor) - A Clojure client for InfluxDB
*   [influxdb-haskell (⭐54)](https://github.com/maoe/influxdb-haskell) - Haskell client library for InfluxDB
*   [InfluxDB.NET (⭐164)](https://github.com/ziyasal/InfluxDB.Net) - .NET client for InfluxDB
*   [InfluxDB PHP SDK (⭐84)](https://github.com/corley/influxdb-php-sdk) - UDP/IP or HTTP adapters for read and write data
*   [influxdbr (⭐93)](https://github.com/dleutnant/influxdbr) - R library for InfluxDB
*   [node-influx (⭐863)](https://github.com/node-influx/node-influx) - InfluxDB Node.js Client

### Projects / Dedicated

*   [agento (⭐28)](https://github.com/abrander/agento) - Client/server collecting near realtime metrics from Linux hosts

### Projects / Non-dedicated

*   [cAdvisor (⭐18k)](https://github.com/google/cadvisor) - Analyzes resource usage and performance characteristics of running containers
*   [gatling (⭐6.7k)](https://github.com/gatling/gatling) - Async Scala-Akka-Netty based Stress Tool
*   [Graphios (⭐289)](https://github.com/shawn-sterling/graphios) - A program to send nagios perf data to graphite (carbon) / statsd / librato / influxDB

### Libraries / Non-dedicated

*   [telemetry (⭐77)](https://github.com/arussellsaw/telemetry) - metric reporting for Go applications

### Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

*   [facette (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/facette/facette) - Time series data visualization and graphing software
*   [grafana (⭐69k)](https://github.com/grafana/grafana) - Gorgeous metric viz, dashboards & editors for Graphite, InfluxDB & OpenTSDB
*   [ostent (⭐180)](https://github.com/ostrost/ostent) - collects and displays system metrics and optionally relays to Graphite and/or InfluxDB

### Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

*   [tutum-docker-influxdb (⭐222)](https://github.com/tutumcloud/influxdb) - Docker image to run an out-of-the-box InfluxDB server

### Queries / Hooks

*   [dbal-influxdb (⭐8)](https://github.com/corley/dbal-influxdb) - Doctrine DBAL for InfluxDB
*   [Influxdb::Arel (⭐11)](https://github.com/undr/influxdb-arel) - Influxdb::Arel is a SQL AST manager for InfluxDB dialect. It simplifies the generation of complex SQL queries

### Awesome lists that include links to InfluxDB / Hooks

*   [awesome-bigdata (⭐14k)](https://github.com/onurakpolat/awesome-bigdata)
*   [awesome-dashboard (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/obazoud/awesome-dashboard)
*   [awesome-db (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/numetriclabz/awesome-db)
*   [awesome-go (⭐147k)](https://github.com/avelino/awesome-go)
*   [awesome-sysadmin (⭐24k)](https://github.com/kahun/awesome-sysadmin)

### Lists of awesome lists that include awesome-influxdb / Hooks

*   [lists (⭐10k)](https://github.com/jnv/lists)
items.content_html:
Unofficial

  • capacitor (⭐63) - A Clojure client for InfluxDB
  • influxdb-haskell (⭐54) - Haskell client library for InfluxDB
  • InfluxDB.NET (⭐164) - .NET client for InfluxDB
  • InfluxDB PHP SDK (⭐84) - UDP/IP or HTTP adapters for read and write data
  • influxdbr (⭐93) - R library for InfluxDB
  • node-influx (⭐863) - InfluxDB Node.js Client

Projects / Dedicated

  • agento (⭐28) - Client/server collecting near realtime metrics from Linux hosts

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • cAdvisor (⭐18k) - Analyzes resource usage and performance characteristics of running containers
  • gatling (⭐6.7k) - Async Scala-Akka-Netty based Stress Tool
  • Graphios (⭐289) - A program to send nagios perf data to graphite (carbon) / statsd / librato / influxDB

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • telemetry (⭐77) - metric reporting for Go applications

Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

  • facette (⭐1.2k) - Time series data visualization and graphing software
  • grafana (⭐69k) - Gorgeous metric viz, dashboards & editors for Graphite, InfluxDB & OpenTSDB
  • ostent (⭐180) - collects and displays system metrics and optionally relays to Graphite and/or InfluxDB

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

  • tutum-docker-influxdb (⭐222) - Docker image to run an out-of-the-box InfluxDB server

Queries / Hooks

  • dbal-influxdb (⭐8) - Doctrine DBAL for InfluxDB
  • Influxdb::Arel (⭐11) - Influxdb::Arel is a SQL AST manager for InfluxDB dialect. It simplifies the generation of complex SQL queries

Awesome lists that include links to InfluxDB / Hooks

  • awesome-dashboard (⭐1.1k)
  • awesome-db (⭐1.3k)
